title: Interstellar was absolutely fucking awful
body:
And I'm sick of the internet pissing itself at how "great" it was.

This guy has the once in a lifetime chance to be an epic space pioneer and decide the next home for humanity but WAAH WAAH I WONT SHUT UP ABOUT MY KIDS FOR 5 MINUTES WAAH WAAH

Because of how much time they wasted on the family bullshit they managed to include all of 3 alien landscapes in the entire movie. No wonder you see the ice planet on every fucking poster, it's the only one they spent any amount of screentime on.

People say that it was supposed to be all "human" and "touching". Makes sense that I'm a dragon then, cause I'd be going "see ya %%%%%%s!" at the first opportunity. I literally cannot think of anything less important in all the universe than *sentimentality*. I never at any point gave a single shit about plan A.

And don't get me started on McConaughey's "I'm a poor yokel and I do poor yokel things" slackjawed schtick. All in all the only thing that made me gag more than this movie was all the praise it got.

Fuck you people.
